c_f.para: The Temperature T in degrees Fahrenheit(F) is equal to the Temperature T in degrees Cesius(C) times 9/5 plus 32

c_k.para: The Temperature T in degrees Kelvin(K) is equal to the Temperature T in degrees Cesius(C) plus 273.15

f_c.para: The Temperature T in degrees Celsius(C) is equal to the Temperature T in degrees Fahrenheit(F) minus 32, times 5/9

f_k.para: The Temperature T in degrees Kelvin(K) is equal to the Temperature T in degrees Fahrenheit(F) minus 32, times 5/9, plus 273.15

k_c.para: The Temperature T in degrees Celsius(C) is equal to the Temperature T in degrees Kelvin(K) minus 273.15

k_f.para: The Temperature T in degrees Fahrenheit(F) is equal to the Temperature T in degrees Kelvin(K) minus 273.15, times 9/5 plus 32
